Html:
I am the only person who has noticed a new branch "release-0.9.0-alpha"???

I see not chatter about this at all on twitter, bing, google or on CodePlex. What's up with this new branch. Is there going to be a MSI for this soon so we can start playing with this?
Good catch! We're working on the .msi now. We'll announce on the blog when it's ready.

Sweet!!! I noticed it yesterday morning and was hoping for an MSI by end of day and was surprised to see that no one noticed, considering how eager everyone is to get there hands on your guys latest changes/enhancements.
I thought we were getting an MSI for the latest release 0.9.0 alpha?
There will be a 0.9 Alpha MSI. Stay tuned!
